monsters.name: Swarm Of Quippers
monsters.conditionImmunities: charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.name: Blood Frenzy
traits.text: The swarm has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.text: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny quipper. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.text: The swarm can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Bites
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. Hit: 14 (4d6) piercing damage, or 7 (2d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.
